tool_description: Constructs hierarchical relationships between collection items, creating structured organization with parent-child relationships and series information.

collection_items.description: List of collection item identifiers to organize

hierarchy_type.description: Type of hierarchy: archival, bibliographic, thematic, chronological

parent_collection.description: Identifier of parent collection or series

grouping_criteria.description: Criteria for automatic grouping of items

error_messages: Invalid hierarchy type: Use archival, bibliographic, thematic, or chronological
Empty collection items: Provide at least one item to organize
Invalid max depth: Depth must be between 1 and 10
Invalid grouping criteria: Use recognized metadata fields for grouping
Circular reference: Items cannot be parents of themselves
usage: Provide collection_items and hierarchy_type. Specify parent_collection for sub-collections. Use grouping_criteria to define automatic organization rules. Set max_depth to control hierarchy complexity.

hierarchy_structure.description: JSON representation of the hierarchical structure

total_levels.description: Number of levels in the created hierarchy

ungrouped_items.description: Items that could not be organized hierarchically
